title: Function Tool Management
subtitle: Manage MCP servers and view available function tools

tooltip.info: What are Function Calling and MCP?
tooltip.marketplace: Browse and install MCP servers from the community
tooltip.serverConfig:
MCP server (stdio) configuration supports the following fields:
command: Command name (e.g. python or uv)
args: Command arguments array (e.g. ["run", "server.py"])
env: Environment variables object (e.g. {"api_key": "abc"})
cwd: Working directory path (e.g. /path/to/server)
encoding: Output encoding (default utf-8)
encoding_error_handler: The text encoding error handler. Defaults to strict.
Other fields please refer to MCP documentation
⚠️ If you deploy AstrBot using Docker, make sure to install MCP servers in the data directory mounted by AstrBot

mcpServers.title: MCP Servers
mcpServers.empty: No MCP servers available, click Add Server to add one
